title: Alt tabbed out, league client screws up
body: I was just in the game champion screen and alt tabbed out but when i alt tabbed out, it made me disconnect from my game and force closed the client, i tried opening it several times and it didnt let me open at all, the league of legends icon popped up but then it kept saying not responding until i was then forced to restart my computer. This has never happened before and only just happen now just as i finished updating the patch, i wasnt able to do anything and i was also forced to remake a game and lose lp, how is this fair when it wasnt my fault that made the client screw up? What am i meant to do riot when your clients are always doing this to people? Please fix this, thanks.
